main_definition: Six is a numerical value representing the quantity after five and before seven, also used in various idioms to convey different meanings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to denote six items or things
meanings_and_examples.example: I have six books on my shelf.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refers to a pair of individuals, typically used in the context of marriage
meanings_and_examples.example: They are the sixth couple to get married this year.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference to an individual's age when they turn six years old
Used in the expression 'six of one and a half dozen of the other', meaning two options are essentially equivalent
meanings_and_examples.example: Is it better to have coffee or tea? Six of one and a half dozen of the other, really.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Referring to six fingers on each hand in certain contexts (though not common)
meanings_and_examples.example: In some cultures, people are born with six fingers instead of five on their hands. These individuals can be referred to as having 'six-fingered' hands.
